name: Ragdoll Rampage
description:
You play as a man who got so angry he decides to attack his own village when they least expect it.  They try to hide but you will find them and tear them apart.

[You don't have to kill all the ragdolls in the cave, they're there for fun :) , you can go through the door]

WASD - Movement

Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump

V - Roll

F - Pull out Sword

Left Click - Light Attack

Right Click - Heavy Attack

(different combos)

R - Restart level

ESC / Tab - Pause Menu
